items.name: Pathogen Spores (Motes)
items.description: Consumable used to infect a Human Host and trigger Neomorph evolution pathways.

items.name: Pathogen Liquid
items.description: Converts a Xeno Queen into a Pathogen Runner to enable Pathogen Hive mechanics.

items.name: Cyborg Parts
items.description: Mechanical enhancements for cyborg xenos, improves battle stats.

items.name: Golden Gen
items.description: Mutagenal reagent that increases chance to hatch rare or hybrid xenos.

items.name: Mutation Stabilizer
items.description: Prevents mutation penalties during hybrid evolution pathways.

items.name: Incubation Accelerator
items.description: Reduces hatch times by 50-75% for a single egg.

items.name: Defensive Pheromones
items.description: Reduces hive losses during invasions for a short period.

items.name: Jelly Extractor
items.description: Doubles royal jelly production for 1-2 hours.
